trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around October 1st 2009
Summary: Round unknown object white in color is circling my home.
divs: Sighting DetailsON THURSDAY OCTOBER 1, 2009 AT 9:15 PM I RECEIVED APHONE CALL FROM MY WIFES GRANMOTHER (VELMA). SHE STATED TO ME THAT THEIR IS A ROUND BRIGHT WHITE IN COLOR OBJECT THAT WAS CIRCLING IN THE SKY NEAR MY HOME. MY SON ERIC STEPHENSON AND I WENT OUTSIDE OF MY HOME AND LOOKED UP INTO THE SKY AND OBSERVED THE OBJECT. I TRIED TO TAKE PICTURES BUT THEY DIDN'T TURN OUT. I THEN CONTACTED MY UNCLE BILL STEPHENSON A MUFON INVESTIGATOR FROM NEW JERSEY AND INFORMED HIM OF THIS EVENT. HE TOLD ME TO CONTACT MUFOM. THERE WAS NO OTHER CRAFT IN THE SKY AND THE OBJECT HAD NO SOUND WITH IT.
